fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Green)(Green) each night.
- (Green): Allow a player to use a second ability each night.
- (1): Attack a player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you live, all Gatherers who attack will bypass passive defense.
- While you live, all Gatherers who don't attack will have Roleblock, Redirection, Control, and Detection Immunity.
